name: Fortune and Folly

name: Deck of Possibilities
text:
Permanent.
[action]: Draw the top card of the possibilities deck. Flip this card over and consult the list on its other side to resolve its effect. Remove the drawn card from the possibilities deck for the remainder of the campaign. (Limit once per game.)

name: Deck of Possibilities
text: - J♠: The Prayer. Nothing happens. - J♥: The Wind. You may take an additional 3 actions this turn. - J♦: The Chest. Gain 10 resources. - J♣: The Tome. Choose 2 different skills. You get +1 to each of those skills for the remainder of the game. - Q♦: The Champion. Select an [[Ally]] asset from among your collection and put it into play (for the remainder of the game). - Q♠: The Sword. Select an [[Item]] asset from among your collection and put it into play (for the remainder of the game). - K♥: The Lifeblood. Heal all damage and horror on your investigator. - K♣: The Lamp. Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy or treachery in play. That card ceases to exist (remove it from the game). - A♠: The Evil Eye. For the remainder of the game, treat each [elder_sign] you reveal on a chaos token as an [auto_fail].

name: Isamara Ordoñez
text:
You get +1 [willpower].
During the upkeep phase, you may choose to not ready Isamara Ordoñez.
[fast] Exhaust Isamara Ordoñez and deal 1 horror to her: Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location or a connecting location. That enemy cannot move until Isamara Ordoñez readies or leaves play.
